title: Research on Power Intrusion Protection System Architecture Based on Edge Computing Nodes
abstract: With the development of information technology, the intelligence level of the power system has been further enhanced, but it also poses challenges to the security of the power system. In order to ensure the safe operation of the power grid, a power intrusion protection system based on edge computing node architecture is proposed. This system is divided into multiple subsystems, and edge node detectors are added to each subsystem to collect and detect power data. By using deep learning, a CNN-LSTM model detector is constructed to extract data features and achieve efficient detection of power intrusions. Test results show that this system can achieve efficient intrusion detection with relatively low memory consumption, effectively reducing the risk of network attacks on the power system, and playing a crucial role in ensuring the safe operation of the power system.

journal.name: Proceedings of the 8th International Conference on Cyber Security and Information Engineering
